long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does your favourite twitch streamer get muted sections due to copyright?

I built an extension so that I could skip these sections without missing any part of the stream

Steps:
1) Add the extension
2) Go to the stream vod
3) Refresh the page once more
4) Click the 'Skip' button next to the 'Settings' button when the stream gets muted
